plugins.name: Vars to CSS
plugins.description: Easily export variables from selected collections into clean, readable CSS — with support for custom prefixes, modes, relative units, and optional class-based grouping.
plugins.tagline: Export Figma variables as CSS.

138582.name: Vars to CSS
138582.description: Easily export variables from selected collections into clean, readable CSS — with support for custom prefixes, modes, relative units, and optional class-based grouping.

plugins.name: Sticky Freedom
plugins.description:
Present your design work in FigJam without worry. Sticky Freedom locks all your design elements while keeping sticky notes editable, so stakeholders can leave feedback without accidentally moving or editing your work.


Perfect for:

  1. Design reviews and critiques
  2. Stakeholder presentations
  3. Client feedback sessions
  4. Cross-team design shares
  5. Async feedback collection


How it works:

  1. Import or create your designs in FigJam
  2. Run Sticky Freedom to lock everything except sticky notes
  3. Share with confidence - stakeholders can only add sticky note feedback
  4. Toggle back to unlock when you need to make updates


One click protection. No more "oops, I moved something" moments. No more duplicate boards for safety. Just your designs, protected, with feedback flowing freely through sticky notes.
plugins.tagline: Collect feedback, while keeping your designs safe.

plugins.name: Flow Sheets Sync
plugins.description:
Flow Sheets Sync connects your Figma design to live data from Google Sheets.


Easily map spreadsheet cells to text layers, update everything with a single click, and keep your layout always in sync with real content.


Ideal for multi-language designs, dynamic marketing layouts, or prototyping with real data.


Features:

– Visual mapping between cells and layers

– One-click sync directly from the sidebar

– Preserves text styles during updates

– Supports multiple sheets and projects

– No authentication or API keys required
plugins.tagline: Smart sync between Figma text layers and Google Sheets data.

139535.name: Flow Sheets Sync
139535.description:

Easily map spreadsheet cells to text layers, update everything with a single click, and keep your layout always in sync with real content.


Ideal for multi-language designs, dynamic marketing layouts, or prototyping with real data.


Features:

– Visual mapping between cells and layers

– One-click sync directly from the sidebar

– Preserves text styles during updates

– Supports multiple sheets and projects

– No authentication or API keys required

networkAccess.reasoning: Necessário para acessar planilhas públicas do Google Sheets via proxy CORS e permitir a sincronização de dados entre o Figma e o Google Sheets

139535.tagline: Smart sync between Figma text layers and Google Sheets data.

plugins.name: Fiverr Community
plugins.description:
Welcome to Fiverr Community 🎉 — the first marketplace built right into Figma ✨ where creators of all kinds can publish gigs 📝, discover services 🔍, and collaborate 🤝.


Whether you're a designer 🎨, developer 💻, writer ✍️, or plugin expert 🧩, this platform empowers you to showcase your skills 🌟 and connect with others in the Figma ecosystem.


✅ Browse gigs

✅ Post your own

✅ Work together — all inside Figma!


Join a growing community that values talent 💡, collaboration 🤗, and creativity 🎯 — all without leaving your design space!

accepted.name: sadik sajid
accepted.description: Hi, I'm sadik sajid — a passionate designer crafting intuitive and visually engaging digital experiences. I specialize in user interfaces, design systems

plugins.tagline: Discover, Share & Sell Your Services — Join the Fiverr Community for All Figma Creators!

139062.tagline: Discover, Share & Sell Your Services — Join the Fiverr Community for All Figma Creators!

plugins.name: FigJam Sticky Locker
plugins.description:
Need to lock ALL your sticky notes before a stakeholder presentation?


FigJam Sticky Locker makes it trivial to freeze or free your stickies in one click:


  1. Lock All Stickies: Instantly find and lock every sticky note on your page to prevent accidental moves or edits.
  2. Unlock All Stickies: Release only the notes you previously locked—nothing else moves.
  3. Auto-select: Highlights affected notes so you can verify changes at a glance.


No setup, no clutter—just install and run from the Plugins menu.
plugins.tagline: Lock and unlock every sticky note in your FigJam board

139057.name: FigJam Sticky Locker
139057.description:
Need to lock ALL your sticky notes before a stakeholder presentation?


FigJam Sticky Locker makes it trivial to freeze or free your stickies in one click:


  1. Lock All Stickies: Instantly find and lock every sticky note on your page to prevent accidental moves or edits.
  2. Unlock All Stickies: Release only the notes you previously locked—nothing else moves.
  3. Auto-select: Highlights affected notes so you can verify changes at a glance.


No setup, no clutter—just install and run from the Plugins menu.
139057.tagline: Lock and unlock every sticky note in your FigJam board

plugins.name: Clean frame numbers

Note: if your file is huge, then go ahead and put on some coffee.

plugins.name: ExportEase
plugins.description:
Transform your Figma design tokens into clean, organized code files that developers will love.

ExportEase bridges the gap between design and development by intelligently exporting your Figma variables and styles to 6 professional formats: CSS, SCSS, JavaScript, JSON, Dart, and Tailwind CSS.

🎯 Why ExportEase?

Smart Organization: Automatically creates separate files for each collection and mode (perfect for light/dark themes). No more messy, mixed token files.

Professional Output: Advanced sorting algorithm handles complex naming patterns - from simple numbering to semantic scales (xs, sm, md, lg, xl).

Developer-Ready: Generates production-quality code with proper formatting, comments, and import instructions. Variables are correctly formatted with fallbacks and references.

Effortless Workflow: One-click exports with ZIP downloads containing organized files and a helpful README with import instructions.

Multiple Formats for Every Stack:

CSS Custom Properties for modern web

SCSS Variables for preprocessing workflows

JavaScript ES6 modules with TypeScript support

JSON for any platform or documentation

Dart constants for Flutter development

Tailwind CSS config extensions ready to use

Perfect for:

✨ Design systems teams maintaining consistent tokens

✨ Developers who need clean, organized design token files

✨ Projects with multiple themes or brands

✨ Teams working across web, mobile, and Flutter platforms

The Result: Instead of manually copying variables or getting messy exports, you get perfectly organized, developer-friendly files that respect your Figma structure and naming conventions.

Export once, use everywhere. Your design tokens, exactly how your developers want them.
plugins.tagline: Transform design tokens into developer-ready code

139399.name: ExportEase
139399.description:
Transform your Figma design tokens into clean, organized code files that developers will love.

ExportEase bridges the gap between design and development by intelligently exporting your Figma variables and styles to 6 professional formats: CSS, SCSS, JavaScript, JSON, Dart, and Tailwind CSS.

🎯 Why ExportEase?

Smart Organization: Automatically creates separate files for each collection and mode (perfect for light/dark themes). No more messy, mixed token files.

Professional Output: Advanced sorting algorithm handles complex naming patterns - from simple numbering to semantic scales (xs, sm, md, lg, xl).

Developer-Ready: Generates production-quality code with proper formatting, comments, and import instructions. Variables are correctly formatted with fallbacks and references.

Effortless Workflow: One-click exports with ZIP downloads containing organized files and a helpful README with import instructions.

Multiple Formats for Every Stack:

CSS Custom Properties for modern web

SCSS Variables for preprocessing workflows

JavaScript ES6 modules with TypeScript support

JSON for any platform or documentation

Dart constants for Flutter development

Tailwind CSS config extensions ready to use

Perfect for:

✨ Design systems teams maintaining consistent tokens

✨ Developers who need clean, organized design token files

✨ Projects with multiple themes or brands

✨ Teams working across web, mobile, and Flutter platforms

The Result: Instead of manually copying variables or getting messy exports, you get perfectly organized, developer-friendly files that respect your Figma structure and naming conventions.

Export once, use everywhere. Your design tokens, exactly how your developers want them.
139399.release_notes:
feat: Streamline to 3 core export formats (CSS, JavaScript, Tailwind)

- Remove DartGenerator, JSONGenerator, and SCSSGenerator classes completely
- Remove Dart, JSON, and SCSS utility functions from StringUtils
- Update ExportService to support only CSS, JavaScript, and Tailwind exports
- Remove Dart/JSON/SCSS buttons from UI and update all descriptions
- Update documentation (README.md, FIGMA_COMMUNITY.md) to reflect 3 formats instead of 6
- Remove all SCSS import logic and instructions from UI
- Focus plugin on essential modern web development formats
- Reduce bundle size from 46.1KB to 44KB

This change dramatically simplifies the plugin by focusing on the three most essential and widely-used web development formats, reducing complexity and maintenance overhead while improving performance.
139399.tagline: Transform design tokens into developer-ready code

plugins.name: Design Rule Checker
plugins.description:
デザインシステムの一貫性を保つための自動チェックツールです。Figmaファイル内のデザイン要素を自動でスキャンし、設定されたデザインルールに違反している箇所を瞬時に検出します。


使い方

チェックしたい要素、または、ページを選択し「チェック開始」ボタンをクリック。

ルールに違反している要素の一覧が表示されたら、クリックして修正箇所を確認する。


主な機能

6つのチェック項目

  1. カラー: ライブラリ変数やスタイルが正しく適用されているかチェック
  2. フォント: 許可されたフォントファミリーとウェイトが使用されているかチェック
  3. 余白: 4pxグリッドに準拠した余白設定かチェック
  4. ボーダー: 適切なボーダー設定がされているかチェック
  5. サイズ: 4pxグリッドに準拠したサイズ設定かチェック
  6. レイアウト: オートレイアウトや制約が正しく設定されているかチェック


高度なフィルタリング機能

  1. 違反の種類別フィルタリング
  2. フレーム別フィルタリング
  3. レイヤー名での検索機能
  4. リアルタイムプレビュー
  5. カスタマイズ可能な設定
  6. 各チェック項目のON/OFF切り替え
  7. チェック対象ノードタイプの選択
  8. 非表示レイヤーの含む/含まない設定


使用シーン

  1. デザインシステムの品質管理
  2. チーム開発でのデザイン一貫性確保
  3. デザインレビュー前の事前チェック
  4. 新規メンバーのデザインルール教育


特徴

  1. 直感的なUI: ダークモード/ライトモード対応の美しいインターフェース
  2. 高速スキャン: 大量のレイヤーも素早くチェック
  3. 詳細な報告: 違反箇所をワンクリックでフォーカス
  4. 柔軟な設定: プロジェクトに合わせたカスタマイズが可能

デザインの品質向上とチームの生産性向上に貢献する、デザイナー必携のツールです。
plugins.tagline: デザインルール自動チェッカー

plugins.name: UX Audit
plugins.description:
Stop memorising and start implementing your knowledge.

A comprehensive tool to analyse & audit frames directly in Figma. The plugin performs accessibility checks, heuristic evaluations, and basic website audits.


Features

Frame Audit

Accessibility Checks: Color contrast analysis, text size validation, touch target size verification

Heuristic Evaluation: Nielsen's 10 heuristics including consistency, system status visibility, user control, and more

Visual Analysis: Color palette and typography consistency checks


Website Audit (Basic)

Basic accessibility and UX scoring

No external API dependencies required

Ready for future enhancement with user-provided API keys

Architecture


This plugin uses a client-side only approach, making it:


✅ Easy to deploy and distribute

✅ No server costs or maintenance

✅ Works immediately for all users

✅ No user data storage concerns
plugins.tagline: Your all in one design critique tool.

plugins.name: Design System AI
plugins.description:
Design System AI는 디자인 시스템의 구조와 자동화 수준을 진단하고 시각화하는 Figma 플러그인입니다.


🎯 주요 기능:


  1. 디자인 토큰, 컴포넌트, 자동화 상태 대시보드
  2. 중복 토큰 및 네이밍 불일치 탐지
  3. 토큰·컴포넌트 사용량 시각화
  4. 디자인 자동화율 측정


일관된 디자인 시스템을 유지하고, 확장 가능한 설계를 위한 강력한 도구입니다.
plugins.tagline: 디자인 토큰부터 컴포넌트까지, 한눈에 진단

plugins.name: Corner Radius Balancer
plugins.description:
Corner Radius Balancer

Tired of manually calculating corner radius for nested elements in Auto Layout? 😩

This plugin helps you automatically balance the corner radius relationship between a parent frame and its child element, based on the simple formula: Parent Radius = Child Radius + Padding.


How it Works

The plugin simplifies your workflow by linking the three key values. When you adjust one, the others intelligently update:

Adjust Parent Radius

Padding remains fixed, and Child Radius updates automatically.

Adjust Padding

Parent Radius remains fixed, and Child Radius updates automatically.

Adjust Child Radius

Padding remains fixed, and Parent Radius updates automatically.


Key Features

Quick Fix Button ⚡

Instantly corrects the corner radius relationship with a single click.

Real-time Preview

See your changes on the canvas as you make them in the plugin.

Sync with Figma UI

Changes made directly in Figma's properties panel are reflected in the plugin.

Supports Various Corner Patterns

Works with uniform, partial, and custom corner radii by preserving the differences between them.


How to Use 📝

Select a Parent Frame

Choose a parent frame that uses Auto Layout and contains a child rectangle.

Adjust Values

Use the sliders or input fields in the plugin to adjust the values.

Complete

Click "Done" when finished.
plugins.tagline: Automatically adjust nested corner radius values.

plugins.name: Frame to Rectangle
plugins.description:
This lightweight plugin helps you convert selected frames into rectangles and vice versa — in one click.


🪄 Key Features:

• Live updates: see how many frames/rectangles are selected

• Warns if selection includes non-frames

• Preserves size, position, fill, stroke, corner radius, constrains.


Great for designers who use frames as placeholders and want to replace them with simple shapes during clean-up or handoff.
plugins.tagline: Convert frames into rectangles and vice versa.

138905.name: Frame to Rectangle
138905.description:
This lightweight plugin helps you convert selected frames into rectangles and vice versa — in one click.


🪄 Key Features:

• Live updates: see how many frames/rectangles are selected

• Warns if selection includes non-frames

• Preserves size, position, fill, stroke, corner radius, constrains.


Great for designers who use frames as placeholders and want to replace them with simple shapes during clean-up or handoff.
138905.release_notes:
- Added ability to convert from rectangle to frame
- Updated UI
138905.tagline: Convert frames into rectangles and vice versa.

plugins.name: WebforJ Converter
plugins.description: The WebforJ Converter is designed to transform Figma UI Designs made with the DWC Kit into a specific JSON Format, enabling seamless integration of designs into applications built with the WebForJ framework. This plugin bridges the gap between design and development, allowing designers to create UI designs in Figma and developers to implement them with minimal manual coding.

plugins.name: horses
plugins.description:
How it works


1. Select the layers you wish to populate.

2. Run the plugin.

3. The plugin will populate all valid layers with a horse.


- Selection can include groups. The plugin will recursively collect all image-fill-compatible nodes.

- The plugin fetches images based on layer orientation (landscape, portrait, squarish).
plugins.tagline: Populate your document with majestic horses

138573.name: horses
138573.description:
How it works


1. Select the layers you wish to populate.

2. Run the plugin.

3. The plugin will populate all valid layers with a horse.


- Selection can include groups. The plugin will recursively collect all image-fill-compatible nodes.

- The plugin fetches images based on layer orientation (landscape, portrait, squarish).
138573.tagline: Populate your document with majestic horses

plugins.name: RocketPen - Generate UI with AI and edit freely
plugins.description:
Product Introduction


RocketPen is a tool that leverages artificial intelligence (AI) to help users create UI designs.

RocketPen aims to significantly boost your productivity.


Value

📌Open Editing Permissions: AI-generated designs can be flexibly edited and modified

🚀Boost Design Efficiency: Smart generation replaces manual drawing

🎨Maintain Design Consistency: Automatically adapts to brand design specifications

💬Natural Language Interaction: Generate professional designs with simple descriptions

📱Multi-platform Design Support: Unified design for Web/Mobile/Desktop platforms

📦Design Asset Reuse: Convert existing websites into editable Figma files


Features

Text-to-Design Generation

Generate UI design drafts based on DesignTokens through text descriptions


Website-to-Design File Conversion

Convert any website into editable Figma design files, requires use with the Chrome extension RocketPenSelector


DesignToken

Support variables definition for DesignToken with visual DesignToken output


Quick Chart Generation

Support common chart types including bar charts, line charts, pie charts, radar charts, etc.


Precise Content Generation

Generate corresponding content through text descriptions within specified Frames


Precise Resource Import

Import icons, images and other resources through text descriptions:

Generate four high-definition animal images


Generate a navigation bar with four buttons: Chat, Contacts, Discover, Settings



Notes

🔒 Privacy Protection: We do not store any user data. Only DesignTokens (variables) are uploaded, and all generated design files remain stored locally on your device. Your data security is fully protected.


🚧 Development Status: This plugin is currently in active development. We're continuously refining the model and workflows to deliver higher-quality design outputs and an improved user experience.



Thank you for your support and understanding! If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to provide feedback.
plugins.tagline: Your Vision,AI-Powered.Generate UI designs instantly with AI, then edit freely to match your vision

plugins.name: コーディングパネル
plugins.description:
「コーディング用の数値がわかりにくい。」

「なんか色が違うと思ったらブレンドモードになってた！」

「字間の設定をよく見逃してしまう・・。」

コーディングをしていてそんな経験はありませんか？


このプラグインでは、レイヤーを選択するとコーディングで必要な数値を、タイポグラフィ、コンテンツ、エフェクトのカテゴリに分けてハイライトします。

さらに、一部コーディングの数値に自動計算したり、カラーコードのHEX値とRGB値の切替えができたり、フレームやグループ化されたレイヤーでもテキストを取得してワンクリックでコピーする機能も追加しました。


多くのデザインデータからコーディングしてきたコーダーが作った、コーダーのためのプラグインです。Figmaでコーディングするなら、ぜひ使ってみてください。


【タイポグラフィ】

テキストレイヤーに反応して、書体、太さ、文字サイズ、行間、字間、文字揃え（上下・左右）、テキスト内容を表示します。


【コンテンツ】

幅、高さ、外見透過、ブレンドモード、塗り、線の情報を表示します。


【エフェクト】

エフェクトの情報を表示します。

インナーシャドウとドロップシャドウは詳細を表示しますが、それ以外のエフェクトはエフェクト名のみ表示します。
plugins.tagline: テキストやコンテンツ、エフェクトなどのコーディングで使用する情報を分かりやすく表示します。騙されたと思って使ってみて。

plugins.description:

– Restricts search to the nearest shared parent (component, frame, or group)

plugins.name: 液态玻璃生成器 Liquid Glass Generator
plugins.description:
介绍

Liquid Glass 是一款帮助设计师快速创建液态玻璃风格 UI 效果的 Figma 插件，可模拟现代界面中常见的毛玻璃、层叠光影等质感表现。


功能说明

•一键生成包含背景模糊、渐变描边和透明填充的液态玻璃容器

•支持调节透明度和模糊强度

•自动叠加纹理图层，增强真实感

•创建位置自动居中显示在当前视图中心


使用方法

1.在 Figma 插件菜单中运行 Liquid Glass

2.设置透明度和模糊参数

3.点击 Apply 按钮生成液态玻璃框

4.自动居中展示，可根据需要自由拖动或组合使用


注意事项

•推荐用于浅色或模糊背景下，视觉更佳

•可与其他 UI 元素组合使用增强表现力

•在复杂画布上运行时可能略有延迟


Introduction

Liquid Glass is a Figma plugin for designers who want to create realistic glassmorphism UI effects effortlessly. It simulates the layered, frosted, and glowing look commonly seen in modern interfaces.


Function Description

•Adds a liquid glass style frame with background blur, angular stroke, and gradient fills

•Includes configurable opacity and blur settings

•Adds optional layered texture for enhanced realism

•Automatically centers the effect on your current viewport


How to Use

1.Run the plugin from the Figma plugins menu

2.Adjust opacity and blur in the popup panel

3.Click “Apply” to generate a liquid glass frame

4.The generated element appears centered in your viewport


Notes

•Works best on light or blurred backgrounds

•You can group the frame with existing UI elements

•Performance may vary with complex canvases

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Create beautiful glassmorphism effects instantly

plugins.name: Toko
plugins.description:
Toko – Bridge your Figma “source-of-truth” tokens straight into code


Bring your design system to life without any copy-&-paste errors. With Toko you can:


1. Export any Figma token set

• Colors, typography, spacing, radius, etc.

• Output as:


• CSS variables

• JSON objects

• JavaScript modules

• Tailwind CSS config


2. Generate CSS classes from text styles

• Automatically map your Figma text styles into CSS class names.

• No hand-writing class names—just pick your style library and go.


3. Push updates directly to GitHub

• Connect a repo in a few clicks

• Keep your token files in sync with every Figma change


4. Flexible export options

• Copy to clipboard

• Download ready-to-use files

• Push to your Repo using PAT


---


Why you’ll love Toko


One-click workflow: Stay in Figma—no jumping between apps.

Design–developer alignment: Ship the exact values your designers approved.

Always up-to-date: Version your tokens alongside your code.

Team-ready: Invite collaborators, lock down your design system, and roll out across projects.


Ready to stop manual syncing and start shipping design tokens as code? Install Toko and transform your Figma styles into production-ready assets today!
plugins.tagline: Toko converts Figma design tokens into ready CSS, JSON, JS, or Tailwind code, exporting to GitHub!!!

plugins.name: Dialekt
plugins.description:
Stop manually copy-pasting text for different languages! Dialekt helps you visualize localized designs early in your UX process. Simply select a mobile frame containing your text layers, and this plugin will:

  1. Find all text content within the selected frame.
  2. Automatically create five new frames, perfectly aligned.
  3. Translate the text in each new frame into Arabic, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, and French.

Ideal for designers working on multi-language apps who need to quickly see how text will look and fit in different languages during the wireframing or mockup stage.


Key Features:

  1. Translates text into 5 pre-set languages: Arabic, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, French.
  2. Automatically duplicates the selected frame for each language.
  3. Preserves original layout and styling (text length may vary).
  4. Simple few clicks operation.
plugins.tagline: Translate your designs into multiple languages

136509.name: Dialekt
136509.description:
Stop manually copy-pasting text for different languages! Dialekt helps you visualize localized designs early in your UX process. Simply select a mobile frame containing your text layers, and this plugin will:

  1. Find all text content within the selected frame.
  2. Automatically create five new frames, perfectly aligned.
  3. Translate the text in each new frame into Arabic, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, and French.

Ideal for designers working on multi-language apps who need to quickly see how text will look and fit in different languages during the wireframing or mockup stage.


Key Features:

  1. Translates text into 5 pre-set languages: Arabic, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, French.
  2. Automatically duplicates the selected frame for each language.
  3. Preserves original layout and styling (text length may vary).
  4. Simple few clicks operation.
136509.tagline: Translate your designs into multiple languages

plugins.name: Layer Query
plugins.description:
A powerful layer selection plugin that lets you find and select layers based on their design properties and custom component properties. Perfect for managing large design files and design systems efficiently.


## Key Features


- Multi-property search with combination filters

- Custom component property support (boolean, text, variant, instance swap)

- Flexible search scope: Entire file, Current page, Root frame, or Selected frames

- Search results with page grouping and navigation

- Real-time search progress with cancellation support

- Cross-page layer selection and navigation


## Supported Properties


**Typography:** Font size, font family, line height, text alignment, text content

**Fill:** Fill color, opacity

**Size:** Width, height

**Padding:** All directions (top, bottom, left, right, vertical, horizontal)

**Auto Layout:** Direction, sizing, alignment, item spacing

**Stroke:** Stroke color, stroke width

**Corner Radius:** All corners and individual corner values

**Layer:** Layer name, structure, type, opacity

**Position:** X and Y coordinates

**Custom:** Component instance properties


## Perfect For


- Design system maintenance and auditing

- Finding layers with specific styling across large files

- Quality assurance and design consistency checks

- Efficient layer organization and cleanup

- Component property management


Save hours of manual searching with precise property-based queries. Transform your Figma workflow from manual hunting to smart selection.


## Beta Version


This plugin is currently in beta. Please report any issues or feedback to help improve the experience.
plugins.tagline: Query and select layers by properties including custom components. Advanced search for efficiency.

plugins.name: 清除/隐藏切片 Clear or Hide Slice
plugins.description:
介绍

清除切片 Clear Slice 是一个高效的图层管理插件，可一键清理选区内的所有 Slice 图层，并提供隐藏/显示控制选项。适用于批量处理切图冗余、整理输出前的画板。


功能说明

  1. 清除选中范围内所有 Slice 图层
  2. 可选是否解除组件实例后再处理
  3. 支持隐藏和显示 Slice 图层
  4. 多操作入口，灵活控制图层状态


使用方法

  1. 选择任意 Frame、Component 或 Instance
  2. 打开插件，勾选是否解除组件实例
  3. 点击所需操作按钮（清除 / 隐藏 / 显示）
  4. 插件将自动处理所有嵌套 Slice 图层


注意事项

  1. 若组件为受保护实例，请先手动解除
  2. 操作不可撤销，建议操作前先保存版本
  3. 插件默认递归处理所有子图层


Introduction

Clear Slice is a lightweight utility plugin that helps you remove, hide, or show all Slice layers within selected elements—ideal for cleaning up export slices before delivery.


Function Description

  1. Remove all Slice layers in the selection
  2. Optional: auto-detach instance before processing
  3. Hide or show Slice layers instead of deleting
  4. Simple UI with precise layer control options


How to Use

  1. Select any Frame, Component, or Instance
  2. Open the plugin and toggle "Detach instance" as needed
  3. Click your desired action: Clear / Hide / Show
  4. The plugin processes all nested slices recursively


Notes

  1. Protected components may require manual detaching
  2. Changes are not reversible — save your work before use
  3. The plugin processes all child layers in depth

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Clean up slice layers with one click and full control

  4. 插件将自动处理所有嵌套 Slice 图层


注意事项

  1. 若组件为受保护实例，请先手动解除
  2. 操作不可撤销，建议操作前先保存版本
  3. 插件默认递归处理所有子图层


Introduction

Clear Slice is a lightweight utility plugin that helps you remove, hide, or show all Slice layers within selected elements—ideal for cleaning up export slices before delivery.


Function Description

  1. Remove all Slice layers in the selection
  2. Optional: auto-detach instance before processing
  3. Hide or show Slice layers instead of deleting
  4. Simple UI with precise layer control options


How to Use

  1. Select any Frame, Component, or Instance
  2. Open the plugin and toggle "Detach instance" as needed
  3. Click your desired action: Clear / Hide / Show
  4. The plugin processes all nested slices recursively


Notes

  1. Protected components may require manual detaching
  2. Changes are not reversible — save your work before use
  3. The plugin processes all child layers in depth

manifest.name: 清除/隐藏切片 Clear or Hide Slice

137592.tagline: Clean up slice layers with one click and full control

plugins.name: SAR - Search and Replace

**SAR (Search and Replace)** is a simple and efficient Figma plugin that helps you rename layers in bulk.


Select any frame or run across the entire page to:

- 🔍 Search for any text in layer names

- ✏️ Replace it with new content

- 🧠 Choose case-sensitive or global replacement


Perfect for cleaning up messy file structures, renaming layers by version or type, and maintaining naming consistency across your design system.


No more manual renaming. Just SAR it. 🚀

plugins.name: Artboard Theme Switcher
plugins.description:
A lightweight plugin for switching between light and dark themes while preserving your design work.


Hierarchical Color System

Automatically adjusts section colors based on nesting depth. Parent sections use your defined colors, while child sections receive calculated brightness adjustments (-10 for light mode, +10 for dark mode per level).


Frame Protection

Multi-layer protection ensures frames, components, and instances are never modified. Only page backgrounds and sections are affected.


Performance Optimized

48KB bundle with sub-200ms execution time. Uses efficient HSB color calculations for smooth operation.


How Hierarchical Coloring Works

  1. Light Mode: Child sections get progressively darker (-10 brightness per nesting level)
  2. Dark Mode: Child sections get progressively lighter (+10 brightness per nesting level)


This creates visual depth automatically without manual configuration. Frame content and designed elements remain completely protected.

accepted.name: Anmol Kumar
accepted.description: i skip meals to design stuff ✷

plugins.tagline: Easily Switch Between Dark and Light Colour themes for your Figma Pages and Sections

plugins.description: Not sure why Figma doesn’t have a built-in shortcut for this—so I made one. This plugin lets you quickly toggle Auto Layout direction and pair it with custom app shortcuts for faster workflows. plugins.name: ThemePathPro
plugins.description:
Solution: ThemePathPro automates style path transformation in your Figma designs. Instantly swap all references from one path to another (e.g., 'M3/sys/dark/' to 'M3/sys/light/'), saving hours of manual work.


Features:

  1. Custom path definition and validation
  2. Apply to selections or entire pages
  3. Smart error handling and feedback
  4. Free and open source


Inspired by workflow challenges with Material Theme Builder, this plugin bridges a critical gap in Material Design workflow, helping designers quickly switch between theme variations.
plugins.tagline: ThemePathPro: Effortlessly Transform Style Paths

Inspired by workflow challenges with Material Theme Builder, this plugin bridges a critical gap in Material Design workflow, helping designers quickly switch between theme variations.

plugins.name: 文本样式导出器 TextStyle Exporter
plugins.description:
介绍

一键提取当前文件中的本地文本样式名称与对应的 key，便于跨文件引用和样式管理。


功能说明

  1. 获取当前 Figma 文件中所有本地文本样式
  2. 显示每个文本样式的名称与唯一 key
  3. 支持一键复制或查看 key，用于开发或样式映射


使用方法

  1. 打开包含本地文本样式的设计文件（建议为团队样式库）
  2. 选中任意节点（或不选中）并运行插件
  3. 点击“获取样式列表”按钮，即可查看所有样式及其 key


注意事项

  1. 插件仅能提取“本地文本样式”，不支持远程团队样式
  2. 请确保文件具有编辑权限，否则无法读取样式
  3. 建议在样式库文件中使用本插件效果最佳


Introduction

Quickly extract all local text style names and their unique keys from your current Figma file — ideal for style management and developer use.


Function Description

  1. Retrieve all local text styles in the current file
  2. Display each text style’s name and corresponding key
  3. Supports easy reference for cross-file usage or developer integration


How to Use

  1. Open the design file containing local text styles (preferably a team library)
  2. Run the plugin — selection is optional
  3. Click the “Fetch Style List” button to display names and keys


Notes

  1. Only local text styles are supported, not team styles from other files
  2. Ensure the file is editable to allow style access
  3. Recommended usage: in a shared style library file for best results

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Export local text styles with name and key
